def f(list):
    m=min(list)
    for i in range(len(list)):
        if list[i]==m:
            break
    return i
            

T=input()
l=[]
for i in range(T):
    l1=map(int,raw_input().split())
    l1.append(l1.pop(0))
    l.append(l1)

for i in range(T):
    ans=''
    x=f(l[i])+1
    minimum=l[i][x-1]
    if x==10:
        ans+='1'
    while minimum>=0:
        minimum-=1
        if x==10:
            ans+='0'
        else:
            ans+=str(x)
    print int(ans)
